org.apache.lenya.transaction
Interface Transactionable

All Superinterfaces:
Lockable, Versionable
public interface Transactionable
extends Versionable

Object to take part in a transaction.

Version:
$Id: Transactionable.java 473861 2006-11-12 03:51:14Z gregor $

          Notify the transactionable that it has been changed.
